review_blob: The best draught for a night out....goes well with food, or conversation.  Not all pours are equal, but a good pour is truly excellent
I love the ephemere batches.  Fruity, and the apple must is a welcome change on the palate.  Unfortunate they last only so long.
The taste on tap is a whole different ballgame from in the bottle...on tap it's actually pretty refreshing, in the bottle it tastes skunky, but palatable for the price.
The bottom of the beer tier, for me.  It's the cheap stuff you get when you've got to fill an alcohol quota (drink or leave), and your budget isn't very high.  Otherwise, stay away.
One of my first (and favorite) beers.  Made locally, the stuff is always excellent when purchased, and goes down smooth on ever occasion.
